mapper.insert: insert into db_goods (gid, good_name, good_num, good_price, good_brand, good_unit, good_shelfTime, good_desc) VALUES (0, #{goodName}, #{goodNum}, #{goodPrice}, #{goodBrand}, #{goodUnit}, #{goodShelfTime}, #{goodDesc})
mapper.update: update db_goods set good_name=#{goodName}, good_num=#{goodNum}, good_price=#{goodPrice}, good_brand=#{goodBrand}, good_unit=#{goodUnit}, good_shelfTime=#{goodShelfTime}, good_desc=#{goodDesc} where gid = #{gid}
